item.title: JWT Cookie Auth with Spring Security
item.description: I’ve been working on a Board Game Collection side project. The backend is Spring Boot with a Neo4J database. Mostly, I use this project as a learning tool as well as for personal use. I built a small mobile app as the client in Flutter but over time realized native mobile was unnecessary. So as another learning opportunity I’ve been bouncing back and forth between using JTE with HTMX as well as learning Svelte.
